creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: six panel skirt covered with cowrie shells; panels joined at top for approximately 8" below waist band; below that not joined; two rows shells edge each side of each panel; base fabric greenish tan; waist band 2" wide with 4 rows of shells along length; ties attached at ends
title: Ceremonial dancing skirt
